thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Nexstim Gets Research And Development Loan From Business Finland

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Nexstim Gets Research And Development Loan From Business Finland
text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - NEXSTIM OYJ:
* REG-NEXSTIM PLC RECEIVES RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT LOAN FROM BUSINESS FINLAND
* BUSINESS FINLAND HAS GRANTED COMPANY AN RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT LOAN AMOUNTING TO APPROXIMATELY EUR 1 MILLION
* ‍LOAN IS UNSECURED, INTEREST RATE IS THREE PERCENTAGE POINTS BELOW BASE INTEREST RATE, OR AT LEAST ONE PERCENT​
* ‍LOAN PERIOD IS SEVEN YEARS AND THREE FIRST THREE YEARS ARE AMORTISATION-FREE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
